Group (2020-present):
Weeekly

Introduction

Zoa is a South Korean singer, rapper, and dancer signed with IST Entertainment. She debuted as the maknae of the girl group Weeekly on June 30, 2020.

On May 26, 2023, Zoa was confirmed as a constant in Mnet's survival show, "Queendom Puzzle". The show began airing on June 13, but Zoa was eliminated in the semi-final, her final rank being 19th.
